comment.author: 11418107@N02
comment._content: In April 1913, John D. Archbold launched a new steam yacht, the Vixen, with his daughter Mrs. MM Van Buren on hand to christen the yacht. Here's the Vixen: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/3294671889/] Seems to be John Dustin Archbold (1848-1916), an oilman, onetime president of Standard Oil: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/John_Dustin_Archbold His children with Annie M. Mills were Mary Lavina, Anne, Frances, and John Foster--so the women in this photo may be among those.
